summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Enterprise CMS with Arabic/English support. Backend APIs show 94.4% success rate with most functionality working. Frontend UI is fully functional with proper RTL Arabic interface and admin dashboard.

critical_bugs.issue: POST request returns 520 Internal Server Error when creating new users
critical_bugs.impact: Admin cannot create new users through the API

ui_bugs.issue: Hero section shows 'Section Update 14:41:38' instead of proper Arabic content

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix user creation API 520 error and update homepage hero content to display proper Arabic text instead of test content
